wxgui-item.name: CommonRasterFormats
wxgui-item.label: Simplified raster import with reprojection
wxgui-item.description: Imports raster data into a GRASS raster map using GDAL library.

wxgui-item.name: CommonVectorFormats
wxgui-item.label: Simplified vector import with reprojection
wxgui-item.description: Imports vector data into a GRASS vector map using OGR library.

wxgui-item.name: DXFImport
wxgui-item.label: DXF import
wxgui-item.description: Converts files in DXF format to GRASS vector map format.

wxgui-item.name: LinkExternalRasterData
wxgui-item.label: Link external raster data
wxgui-item.description: Link GDAL supported raster data as a pseudo GRASS raster map layer.

wxgui-item.name: LinkExternalVectorData
wxgui-item.label: Link external vector data
wxgui-item.description: Creates a new pseudo-vector map as a link to an OGR-supported layer.

wxgui-item.name: OutputFormatForVectorData
wxgui-item.label: Output format for vector data
wxgui-item.description: Defines vector output format utilizing OGR library.

wxgui-item.label: Show current region extent in Map Display
wxgui-item.description: Shows the extent of the computational region in Map Display.

wxgui-item.description: Create new empty vector map

wxgui-item.label: Manage color rules interactively
